tosdr.case: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
quoteText: In the event that any provision of these Terms is held to be invalid or unenforceable, then that provision will be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary, and the remaining provisions of these Terms will remain in full force and effect.
